short_summary: Task based inspection services for I.T
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services
## Procurement ID: R138032

### Overview

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is inviting proposals from qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders for Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) on a tier 2 level, specifically for architecture based on tasks and informatics. This procurement is set aside for Aboriginal Business under the federal government’s Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business.

### Procurement Details
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-06-22T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-09-29
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-09-30

### Tender Description

The tender is for three (3) contracts, each for two (2) years, with two (2) option years. SSC estimates 220 days per resource. The procurement is limited to those TBIPS EN578-170432 Indigenous Supply Arrangement Holders who are qualified under Tier 2 for services in the National Capital Region for the following categories:

* I.11 Technology Architect Level 3 (100 resources per year)
* I.11 Technology Architect Level 2 (20 resources per year)
* I.10 Technical Architect Level 3 (25 resources per year)
* I.10 Technical Architect Level 2 (5 resources per year)
* P.2 Enterprise Architect Level 3 (15 resources per year)
* P.2 Enterprise Architect Level 2 ( 5 resources per year)

### Tender Requirements

* **Security Requirement:**
+ Minimum Corporate Security Required: Secret-level Facility Security Clearance

### Contract Authority

* **Name:** Dana Hemmings
* **Phone Number:** (343) 549-4735
* **Email Address:** dana.hemmings@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* **Inquiries:**
    + Inquiries regarding this RFP requirement should be submitted to the Contracting Authority named above.

### How to Submit a Proposal

*   Bidders are advised that “buyandsell.gc.ca” is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.
*   Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the Qualified Supply Arrangement Holders invited to bid on this requirement.

### Considerations

*   The TBIPS method of supply is refreshed three (3) times per year.
*   To find out how to become a “Qualified SA
